title: HDFC Bank Q4 profit jumps 23% to ₹10,055 cr; asset quality improves - Fortune India
content: HDFC Bank Q4 profit jumps 23% to ₹10,055 cr; asset quality improves  Fortune India
description: HDFC Bank Q4 results: The lender’s gross bad loan ratio dropped to 1.17%, while net NPA ratio too fell to 0.32% in March quarter of 2022.
